comment: If you want a professor to teach you about Architecture, challenge your abilities, and teach you some pretty useful skills, he is a great choice. He set up daily tasks to help us with our time management so that we would get, at least, most of our things finished in time for reviews. He brought in jurors that gave useful constructive criticism!

I had Professor Smith for Studio II and he is very thorough in terms of directions and what he wants with your projects! AMAZING at giving feedback. Also very funny and empathetic, I have nothing bad to say about him--He created a positive, welcoming environment. Not gonna lie, I would take his class again if I could!!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Great professor who really wants to push your ideas to its full potential. Really understands student life and workload while not giving you an easy way out. Awesome professor if you want to learn but in a positive environment. All positive things!

rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: Great professor especially for first year. Gives good feedback on your projects and makes sure to offer help if needed
